https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/4IioGWgJplaQbulK4lPuGeOJEr4.jpg Sangtae and his teenage daughter Doyeon are constantly arguing and haven't had a genuine conversation in years. When their souls are switched by a magical force for seven days, they must learn to tackle the awkward and unfamiliar situation in each other's shoes. Daddy You, Daughter Me
